content: cardo holiday hats cozy knit hats in a series of 5 different stripe options in our bulky-weight cardo yarn we chose cardo in putty as our main color in each hat and then played with different stripe sequences in a contrast color to top it all off we made a big festive pom pom our free striped hat pattern arrives just in time for the holidays to knit mix and match striped hats for knit gifts - oh what fun it is to choose between or all 5 different stripe options ///// sizes 20 head circumference finished materials manos del uruguay cardo 100% corriedale wool approx 109yds/100g 1 skein each of both c1 and c2 needed per hat shown in d2241 putty with d21905 fuchsia 1x1 stripes d2040 daffodil 2x2 stripes d2102 juanita 2x3 stripes d2475 very vivid 1x3 stripes and d2431 helium half and half us 10 / 6 mm 16 circular needle and double-pointed needles or size to obtain gauge us 9 / 5 5 mm 16 circular needle ring marker gauge 13 stitches and 19 rounds = 4 in stockinette stitch on larger needle notes this hat is shown in 5 different colorways though each hat is the same size
